CLOCK_TYPE=NTP
CLOCK_SERVER=pool.ntp.org

if type -p gethostip > /dev/null; then
	CLOCK_IP=$( gethostip -d $CLOCK_SERVER )
elif type -p dnsip > /dev/null; then
	CLOCK_IP=$( dnsip $CLOCK_SERVER | cut -d' ' -f1 )
else
	CLOCK_IP=
fi
